summary: Gets a part/component of a date
description:
Retrieves a specified portion of a given date object.
It enables the extraction of specific details from a date object, such as year, month, or day.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date (and optionally time) to get a part of.

parameters.name: component
parameters.description:
The component for the value given. The following pre-defined components are available:

- millisecond: Milliseconds
- second: Seconds .
- minute: Minutes
- hour: Hours
- day: Days - changes only the the day part of a date
- day of week: Day of Week
- day of year: Day of Year
- week: Weeks (equivalent to 7 days)
- week number: Week Number
- month: Months
- year: Years

Replacements with the component `year`, `month` or `day` do never change the time.

returns.description: Returns retrieved portion of a date.
